Title: NUPENG, PENGASSAN reject FG’s planned sale of JV oil assets
Summary: Nigeria Union of Petroleum and Natural Gas Workers (NUPENG) reject FG’s planned sale of JV oil assets . NUPENG, PENGASSAN reject alleged plans by the Federal Government to divest significant stakes in Joint Venture (JV) oil and gas assets .

Title: Ayabecca’s drops ‘God over everything’ featuring Viighoo, Biggy Khali, Boc Madaki
Summary: Fast-rising Nigerian artist Ayabecca has released a new single titled God Over Everything . The track, which blends elements of faith and hip-hop, is already drawing attention for its mix .

Title: Nigeria records 21.4 road crash deaths per 100,000 people — WHO report
Summary: Nigeria has been ranked among the countries with the highest road traffic deaths in Africa . Nigeria recorded 21.4 deaths per 100,000 people, according to the World Health Organization’s (WHO) Global Status Report on Road Safety 2023 .

Title: Pot collapse was a blessing in disguise, says Hilda Baci
Summary: Nigerian celebrity chef, Hilda Effiong Bassey, popularly known as Hilda Baci, has described the collapse of the cooking pot during her Guinness World Record jollof rice attempt as a blessing in disguise . The incident happened on September 12, 2025, at the National Institute of Agriculture in Nigeria .

Title: Police officer, one other killed as container crushes tricycle in Lagos
Summary: A 40-foot container truck overturned and crushed a commercial tricycle in Lagos . Two people, including a serving police officer, has been killed on Tuesday . The Lagos State Traffic Management Authority (LASTMA) confirmed the deaths .

Title: EFCC arrests 28 suspected Yahoo boys in Ilorin
Summary: Operatives of the Ilorin Zonal Directorate of the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission, EFCC, on Tuesday arrested 28 suspected internet fraudsters . The arrest followed credible intelligence linking the suspects to cybercrime activities across Kwara State .

Title: Bauchi Govt removes illegal structures ahead of economic summit
Summary: The Bauchi State Government has begun removing illegal structures, billboards, and waste disposal sites in the metropolis ahead of the grand finale of its economic summit .

Title: Davido my brother, I will never betray him – Tiwa Savge
Summary: Afrobeats star Tiwa Savage has spoken on her relationship with fellow music icon Davido . Tiwa says she harbors no ill will toward Davido, stressing that she will never betray him .

Title: Eno to New A’Ibom TRC Chairman: Don’t attempt to own my political structure
Summary: Governor Umo Eno swore in HRM Sylvester Saviour Udofia as the new Chairman of the Akwa Ibom State Traditional Rulers Council, with a charge to remain apolitical in discharging his duties and avoid contesting political structures with the governor .

Title: Parliamentarians caution ECOWAS member states against hasty  adoption of AI
Summary: ECOWAS,Parliament, warns against hasty adoption of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in parliamentary businesses . The warning was given in Port Harcourt, Rivers State, Nigeria, at the ongoing 2nd 2025 ECOWas Parliamentary Seminar/Extraordinary Session, with theme: “Harnessing Artificial Intelligence for the future .
